title: [Large-scale] Understanding Informal Learning Experiences for Employees in Korean SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational job competencies (office/administrative work experience)
context.additional_context: Field-centered learning environment influenced by family-like organizational culture, multiple workload burdens, and lack of systematic education systems

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four characteristics of informal learning (absolute dependency, immediate application, relationship-centricity, trial-and-error) occurring in South Korean SME environments.
Learners can analyze the impact of organizational culture (family-like atmosphere, multitasking) and Korean values (guanxi relationships, face-saving) on learning patterns.
Learners can plan and execute informal learning strategies in their own work environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
